text: E fun won ni ibugbe ninu ibugbe yin bi aye se gba yin mo. E ma se ni won lara lati ko ifunpinpin ba won. Ti won ba je oloyun, e nawo le won lori titi won yoo fi bi oyun inu won. Ti won ba n fun omo yin ni oyan mu, e fun won ni owo-oya won. E damoran laaarin ara yin ni ona tâ€™o dara. Ti oro ko ba si rogbo laaarin ara yin, ki elomiiran ba oko (fun omo) ni oyan mu
